## Description {#details}

This file provides utility for Memory Model Relaxation Annotations (MMRAs).

Those annotations are represented using Metadata. The MMRATagSet class offers a simple API to parse the metadata and perform common operations on it. The MMRAMetadata class is a simple tuple of MDNode that provides easy access to all MMRA annotations on an instruction.

<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Helper class to manipulate &#96;!mmra&#96; metadata nodes.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><Highlight kind="comment">/// This can be visualized as a set of &quot;tags&quot;, with each tag</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><Highlight kind="comment">/// representing a particular property of an instruction, as</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><Highlight kind="comment">/// explained in the MemoryModelRelaxationAnnotations docs.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><Highlight kind="comment">/// This class (and the optimizer in general) does not reason</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><Highlight kind="comment">/// about the exact nature of the tags and the properties they</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><Highlight kind="comment">/// imply. It just sees the metadata as a collection of tags, which</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><Highlight kind="comment">/// are a prefix/suffix pair of strings.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mmrametadata"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mmrametadata/#aa3956313cdbc57c33fb1bb92b9e7396c">MMRAMetadata</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
